annie-and-arjun.title: Annie and Arjun
synopsis: This is a heartwarming story of two children, Annie and Arjun, who are puzzled by the assignment of chores to them and see it as a problem that stops them from spending time with each other. Through the course of the story, Annie and Arjun, debate, ideate and finally come up with a solution that can be an inspiration to many.

Up till the age of eight, children learn mostly through observation and imitation. Several places like home, schools and other institutions become instrumental in displaying for the child roles they are supposed to adopt. Both Annie and Arjun are thinking about gender norms at home, and develop a new system that works out to their advantage (so they have more play time!) at the same time sharing responsibly work at home.
